BlackFortress:

BlackFortress' allarm started to ring, an stranger had come in 
BlackFortress (Silverscout). 

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::KitKat2::
> 
> Now in the base she picked up a scent that was out of place.
> "KitKat, terorrize."
> She transformed to bot mode, and pulled a plasma rifle.
> She waited for the bot to come near her room.
